description: This is the unfavorable distance after hit a character with the taunt

Kara-Throw: Close S.LP / C.HP / S.MK / Close S.HK

Motion: Close LP -> Close MP (1 hit) -> Close HP
Close LK -> Close MK -> Close HK
Close LP -> Close MP (1 hit) -> Crouch HK -< Close HK
Close HP (2 hits) -> Crouch HK -> Far HK
